Title: Neural interfaces based on flexible graphene transistors: A new tool for electrophysiology
Source: Tech. Dig. Int. Electron Meet. IEDM
Abstract: © 2019 IEEE.The use of graphene transistors for transducing neural activity has demonstrated the potential to extend the spatiotemporal resolution of electrophysiological methods to lower frequencies, providing a new tool to understand the role of the infra-slow activity.
